BEIJING , May 19 ( Yonhap ) -- U.N. Secretary - General Ban Ki - moon and Chinese President Xi Jinping on Monday held talks addressing North Korea 's nuclear program , the ongoing crisis in Ukraine and the civil war raging in Syria , China 's foreign ministry said .
The meeting between Ban , who is on a four - day visit to China from Sunday , and Xi took place in Shanghai ahead of a regional security summit there , the Chinese ministry said in a statement .

RelatedSentence: Ban and Xi exchanged views on the situation on the Korean Peninsula , Ukraine , Syria , climate change and other issues , the statement said , without elaborating .
